actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to provide that employers shall not be required to bargain with labor organizations whose representative status has not been established by a secret ballot election.

summary.text: Provides, under the National Labor Relations Act, that employers shall not be required to bargain with labor organizations whose representative status has not been established by a secret ballot election as provided for in such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to provide that employers shall not be required to bargain with labor organizations whose representative status has not been established by a secret ballot election.
